summary: The module creates Advanced SubStation Alpha (ASS) subtitle files that visually highlight speech alignment results. It can produce subtitles where either individual tokens or whole words are highlighted in sync with their alignment timings, using segment boundaries to group text that appears simultaneously. Helper utilities handle character counting, time formatting, color conversion, and utterance resegmentation.
